ISSUE.TITLE: Add location by slug to device filterset
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.6 ### Feature type Other ### Proposed functionality Similar to site, platform, and other fields the location field should be added to lookup by slug and not just by location ID. ### Use case Mainly usable for API users it allows the use of unique slugs for filtering without the need to lookup the object's ID ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_
